items.text: pitched up around off, comes forward and clips it towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: short of length on middle and leg, worked away towards deep midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.preText: Aulindo : "@Sadman: Worth noting the fact that Tamim averaged below 20 for the first 30 innings or so and still averages a respectable 36+ overall. Were we to exclude the first 30 innings he would comfortably average 40+ or so IMO and not just only for the last 4-5 years. "
items.text: fuller outside off, driven towards extra cover
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length ball on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: looked like a googly, fuller outside off, lunges forward and pushes it towards cover
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: pitched up again, turned away towards short midwicket from the front foot
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller on off, punched towards long-on
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: fuller on middle and leg, tickled towards short fine leg
items.postText: arun: "i was away for quite sometime. is there any update about the argument made by Carlos Brathwaite when Powel got out??... " -- "Yeah, there's a word out of the Bangladesh management that Brathwaite may have been angry because he wasn't allowed to run into the field with gloves in the previous over," says Isam. "His ire was with the umpires."
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText:
Vipul: "If Shai Hope is not on the field since he is injured, who is doing the wicket keeping duties for WI ?? -- Hetmyer, right from the first ball of this innings

Around the wicket
items.text: back of length on middle and leg, punched towards long-on
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: fuller on off this time, pushed towards long-on for one more
items.shortText: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: bowled across outside off, pushed down the wicket, Allen moves across and makes a stop
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: pitched up again, turned away towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball, spinning on the pads and keep low, almost chipped towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length outside off, goes back and punches it back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: googly again, short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep backward point, a sliding stop by Brathwaite near the boundary
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

items.text: length ball, spinning on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg
items.shortText: Bishoo to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: fuller on middle and leg, flicked towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length ball, spinning big from around off stump, goes back to glance it fine, misses and gets hit on the pads
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: was looking to play a sweep but changes his mind and cuts this length ball towards point
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length on off and middle, punched towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: backs away and makes some room, hammers it towards long-off, straight to the fielder who was very close the fence
items.shortText: Allen to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run
Allen to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, Tamim fails to dig it out, was there an edge, there might have been but Hetmyer drops the ball. Replays show it was bat hitting the turf, no contact with the ball
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fuller again, pushed on the off side
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: pitched up on middle and leg, digs it out back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Allen to Tamim Iqbal, no run
